name: Ancient Knowledge Demo
description:
Ancient knowledge is an adventure game in which you will explore the ruins of settlements of the powerful ancient civilization that lived here long time ago, overcoming the traps and puzzles they left.

FEATURES

- Nice low poly graphics and attention to detail

- Magical atmosphere that will allow you to immerse yourself in the culture of ancient India

- Explore ancient palaces and temples, overcoming many traps

- A large number of different types of puzzles

  Add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101770/Ancient_knowledge/

Follow me on Twitter:  https://twitter.com/MalyshkoOleg
